directions: Chop off wing tips and top parts, retaining only the middle section of the chicken wings. Arrange wings in a mixing bowl.
Toss through the wings to coat evenly.
Transfer the marinated wings to an airtight plastic container and leave to marinate overnight in the refrigerator.
Grill the wings in a preheated oven at 200Â°C for 10 minutes each side or until cooked through.
ingredients: 2 tbsp Shao Hsing Hua Tiau wine (optional)
title: Grilled Honey Chilli Sauce Chicken Wings
